price: 8. Ir Mes nesukūrėme jų (Pasiuntinių su) kūnais, kurie nevalgo maisto, nei yra nemirtingi.
arabic: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ جَسَدٗا لَّا يَأۡكُلُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَمَا كَانُواْ خَٰلِدِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā jaʿalnāhum jasadan lā yakulūna al-ṭaʿāma wamā kānū khālidīna
